Package guiInbox

Class ModelInbox

java.lang.Object
guiInbox.ModelInbox
public class ModelInbox extends Object

Title: ModelInbox Class

Description: Model component for private inbox. Handles all database operations for viewing and managing private messages.

      Sends a reply to a message.
      Parameters:
      senderId - The username of the sender
      recipientId - The username of the recipient
      postId - The ID of the post being referenced (nullable)
      content - The content of the reply message
      parentMessageId - The ID of the parent message being replied to
      Returns:
      true if the reply was sent successfully, false otherwise
